name: On the Wire (FryDev)
description: In this simple arcade game made for the GoGodot Jam #2, you play as a flightless pigeon trying to survive on a faulty power line hanging in the sky. In order to preserve as long as possible, you will have to jump & dodge all the electric sparks that zip your way. Font is "Thaleah Fat" by TinyWorlds, & music is "Slam-Funk" composed and arranged by Haley Halcyon.
